title: Creating a reading list of articles on non-autoregressive sequence generation involves exploring various aspects of this technique, including its comparison to autoregressive methods and different decoding strategies
note: Here’s a list of 20 articles up to 2022 that cover these topics:

container-title: "Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation." *International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR)*

title: This foundational paper introduces non-autoregressive models for machine translation, contrasting them with autoregressive models
Deterministic Non-Autoregressive Neural Sequence Modeling by Iterative Refinement
container-title: *Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Discusses iterative refinement as a decoding strategy for non-autoregressive models
Fast Decoding in Sequence Models Using Discrete Latent Variables
container-title: *International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML)*

title: Explores the use of discrete latent variables to improve non-autoregressive sequence generation
Mask-Predict: Parallel Decoding of Conditional Masked Language Models
container-title: *Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Introduces a parallel decoding method using masked language models
Inverted Factorization for Non-Autoregressive Speech Recognition
container-title: *Interspeech*

title: Applies non-autoregressive techniques to speech recognition, comparing with autoregressive methods
Non-Autoregressive Machine Translation with Auxiliary Regularization
container-title: *AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*

title: Discusses regularization techniques to enhance non-autoregressive models
Fast Structured Decoding for Sequence Models
container-title: *Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)*

title: Proposes structured decoding methods for faster sequence generation

container-title: "Non-Autoregressive Machine Translation with Disentangled Context Transformer." *International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML)*

title: Introduces a disentangled context transformer for improved non-autoregressive translation
Exploring Non-Autoregressive End-to-End Models for Speech Synthesis
container-title: *IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing (ICASSP)*

title: Investigates non-autoregressive models in the context of speech synthesis
Aligned Cross Entropy for Non-Autoregressive Machine Translation
container-title: *International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML)*

title: Proposes a new loss function to improve non-autoregressive translation
Sequence-Level Training for Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation
container-title: *AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*

title: Discusses sequence-level training techniques for non-autoregressive models
Levenshtein Transformer
container-title: *Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)*

title: Introduces a transformer model that uses Levenshtein distance for non-autoregressive generation
Non-Autoregressive Machine Translation with Latent Alignments
container-title: *Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Explores latent alignment models for non-autoregressive translation

container-title: "Improving Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Monotonic Alignment." *Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: Discusses monotonic alignment to enhance non-autoregressive models

container-title: "Guiding Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation Decoding with Reordering Information." *AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*

title: Investigates the use of reordering information to guide non-autoregressive decoding
Non-Autoregressive Transformer for Speech Recognition
container-title: *IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing (ICASSP)*

title: Applies non-autoregressive transformers to speech recognition tasks
Parallel Decoding for Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with a Conditional Masked Language Model
container-title: *Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Explores parallel decoding using conditional masked language models

container-title: "Improving Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Word Alignment." *Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: Discusses the integration of word alignment in non-autoregressive models
Sequence-Level Knowledge Distillation for Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation
container-title: *International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR)*

title: Explores knowledge distillation techniques for non-autoregressive models
Non-Autoregressive Neural Machine Translation with Enhanced Decoder Input
container-title: *AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*

title: Proposes enhancements to decoder input for non-autoregressive translation

These articles provide a comprehensive overview of non-autoregressive sequence generation, its comparison with autoregressive methods, and various decoding strategies. They cover theoretical advancements, practical applications, and performance improvements in different domains
